TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_TASK_DISPLAY_OBJECT extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of image and data that is required to use the image to display a task or the background on a task pad.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the MMC\_TASK\_DISPLAY\_OBJECT structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
